name: @aherrahul/rds-icons
description: A rds icons built by rahul aher, using for RDS dessign system and Vue components used in project

scripts.build: npm run transform-icons && npm run copy-library-assets
scripts.build:showcase: npm run build && npm run bundle-showcase && npm run copy-showcase-files
scripts.copy-showcase-files: cpx showcase/index.html dist/showcase && cpx showcase/styles.css dist/showcase
scripts.copy-library-assets: cpx package.json dist && cpx README.md dist
